ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Approved')
&&
or(
( UPPER( $User.EmployeeNumber) != UPPER( Current_Approver_EID__c ) ) ,
isnull(Current_Approver__c))
&&
or( $RecordType.Name ='Solution GTO Technical', $RecordType.Name ='Solution GTO Technical (Read Only)')
&&
$Profile.Name !='System Administrator'
&&
$Profile.Name !='Honeywell System Administrator'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Primary/Secondary can Approve the Solution
